Translated_Response: -Impossibility to send an email to a group of contacts

Translated_Response: Would it be possible to add other shades of colors for email files please?

Original_Response: Certaines personnes n'ont pas remarqué ou ne savent pas modifier le nom Default de leur compte mail. Serait-il possible de mettre automatiquement un nom en fonction de l'adresse mail dans le nom du compte svp ? Il est parfois difficile de se rendre compte de qui nous a envoyé un mail lorsque tout le monde s'appelle Default.
Translated_Response: Some people have not noticed or cannot change the name DEFAULT from their mail account. Would it be possible to automatically put a name according to the email address in the name of the account please? It is sometimes difficult to realize who sent us an email when everyone is called Default.

Translated_Response: Thank you for these taking into account

Translated_Response: use of carbonio only if Thunderbird is unavailable

Translated_Response: Overall I have trouble with this messaging especially to find emails

Original_Response: Cette messagerie est tout sauf intuitive et la rend inutilisable.

Original_Response: - La gestion des mails filtrés (après une recherche sur un terme ou un nom) est difficile. Certes les étiquettes semblent être une partie de la solution mais ne répondent pas à toutes les possibilités de filtrage. Donc filtrage à revoir.
Translated_Response: - The management of filtered emails (after a search on a term or a name) is difficult. Certainly the labels seem to be a part of the solution but do not respond to all the possibilities of filtering. So filter to review.

Original_Response: Il est pénible de devoir rentrer ses codes pour accéder à la messagerie alors qu'on y accède depuis le biome (pour lequel on a déjà rentré ses codes)
Translated_Response: It is painful to have to enter your codes to access messaging when you have access to it from the biome (for which we have already returned his codes)

Original_Response: Il n'y a pas assez d'étiquette de couleur et les couleurs choisi ne se mettent pas sur la totalité de la ligne
Translated_Response: There is not enough color label and the colors chosen do not put themselves on the entire line

Original_Response: La recherche d'un mail dans un seul dossier n'est plus possible
Translated_Response: The search for an email in a single file is no longer possible

Translated_Response: - Little readable results bar: it would be pleasant to be able to widen this bar in order to display more detailed titles.

Original_Response: Merci beaucoup d'avoir sollicité notre avis.
Translated_Response: Thank you very much for requiring our opinion.

Original_Response: J'aurais aimé disposer d'une boîte permanente (et non pas à générer à chaque fois avec une recherche / filtre) des non lus (mails en attente de réponse pour moi)
Translated_Response: I would have liked to have a permanent box (and not to generate each time with a search / filter) of non -read (emails awaiting response for me)

Original_Response: Cette messagerie est complètement inefficace et loin d'être pratique.

Translated_Response: The default police are too small. I have to change it every time I connect. Impossible to record once and for all the parameter. Otherwise very useful and practical. THANKS

Translated_Response: - When the pop -up email we see an overview of the email but not the name or the recipient's email address

Translated_Response: I have no comments to add for now

Translated_Response: The search for an email is not selective enough.

Translated_Response: You should have the choice to open a new window or not when you respond to an email.

Original_Response: Modifier la police et le contraste – rendre plus performante la recherche de mails et pièces jointes – agrandir les marqueurs de mails (petits drapeaux) – résoudre le problème de la disparition (ou marqué comme non lu) des mails envoyés
Translated_Response: Modify the police and the contrast - make the search for emails and attachments more efficient - enlarge the markers of emails (small flags) - solve the problem of the disappearance (or marked as not read) of the emails sent

Translated_Response: Be able to respond more easily (without window opening)

Original_Response: Icone marqueur plus visible
Translated_Response: More visible marker icon

Translated_Response: Yes. That the modification of the display is kept. When we modify the size of the characters it is not persistent

Original_Response: Je voudrais pouvoir composer mes mails dans une fenêtre distincte (pop-up). Le compositeur de courriel actuel est catastrophique comparé à la solution précédente (bluemind).
Translated_Response: I would like to be able to compose my emails in a separate window (pop-up). The current email composer is catastrophic compared to the previous solution (Bluemind).

Translated_Response: I come to write my messages in Word and copy/paste.

Translated_Response: The initials of the interlocutor are completely useless. Non -functional and illegible application.

Translated_Response: Several small points:

Original_Response: ° La fenêtre d'écriture du nouveau courrier est une bonne amélioration
Translated_Response: ° The new mail writing window is a good improvement

Original_Response: Je suis insatisfaite de cette messagerie
Translated_Response: I am dissatisfied with this messaging

Translated_Response: Improvement priority: size of email management icons / Multi Word textual research

Original_Response: Changer de messagerie !
Translated_Response: Change messaging!

Original_Response: Très peu convivial. Retour en début de liste des e.mails à chaque fois. Icones peu claires et navigation compliquée. Impossible à utiliser à l'étranger ou très compliqué.
Translated_Response: Very little friendly. Back at the start of the list of e.mails each time. Unclear icons and complicated navigation. Unable to use abroad or very complicated.

Original_Response: Il est difficile de voir la liste des destinataire d’un mail dans l’interface une fois celui ci reçu ou envoyé.
Translated_Response: It is difficult to see the list of recipients of an email in the interface once it has been received or sent.

Original_Response: Quelques soucis parfois avec Firefox : la boîte mail ne s’affiche pas ( page blanche ) pas de soucis avec chrome.
Translated_Response: Some concerns sometimes with Firefox: the mailbox is not displayed (blank page) no worries with chrome.

Translated_Response: However, the university computers are mainly under Firefox (impossible to use Chrome).

Original_Response: Je ne suis pas satisfaite de la présentation des mails et pas du tout satisfaite de l'affichage des agendas qui est très brouillon surtout quand on doit utiliser plusieurs agendas pour travailler. Je perds beaucoup de temps avec ce nouvel outil.
Translated_Response: I am not satisfied with the presentation of emails and not at all satisfied with the display of agendas which is very rough especially when you have to use several agendas to work. I waste a lot of time with this new tool.

Original_Response: je ne suis pas du tout satisfaite de carbonio que ce soit des mails et encore moins du calendrier
Translated_Response: I am not at all satisfied with carbonio that it is emails and even less of the calendar

Original_Response: toutes les fonctionnalités sont à revoir car actuellement rien n'est intuitif
Translated_Response: All features are to be reviewed because currently nothing is intuitive

Original_Response: Pour les mails il faut pouvoir ouvrir dans un autre onglet et pouvoir le mettre en vis à vis.
Translated_Response: For emails you have to be able to open in another tab and be able to put it on the opposite.

Original_Response: On devrait pouvoir redimensionner la largeur de la colonne des dossiers
Translated_Response: We should be able to resize the width of the file of files

Original_Response: Il est crucial de distinguer étiquettes de messages et catégorie d'event de calendrier
Translated_Response: It is crucial to distinguish message labels and calendar event category

Translated_Response: Absolutely not intuitive use. Complexity of the tool. Search for an extremely long past email.

Translated_Response: How do we see the weight of a message? The weight of messaging and its % occupancy?

Original_Response: L'architecture des dossiers classés n'est pas satisfaisante en ergonomie. Manque de visibilité des dossiers / sous-dossiers
Translated_Response: The architecture of classified files is not satisfactory in ergonomics. Lack of visibility of files / subfolders

Original_Response: Il faut pouvoir rédiger les courriers dans une autre fenêtre et non pas dans l'interface ce qui rend l'utilisation moins agréable.

Original_Response: Le marquage (drapeau) est trop peu visible.
Translated_Response: The marking (flag) is too little visible.

Translated_Response: The highlighting of initials in the mail reception icon is completely ineffective. You should systematically see the address of the sender.

Translated_Response: - multiple selection to move or delete emails without choosing one or all
